Articles.Content:
I've been wanting to make a 2-man capsule part for a while, but the idea seemed daunting. But with encouragement from the forums and some great tutorial posts/videos, I finally tried my hand at one. So I sat down this morning and hammered one out.

I fell in love with the look of the Russian PPTS capsule. But I really wanted a 2-kerbal pod, so I borrowed the look and sized it down. It's a 1.875 base and .625 top. I'm still working on tweeking the cfg file for optimal mass, buoyancy, MP, electrical, etc... but I wanted to show off the outside right now.

[imgur]0OhjG[/imgur]

I've still got a lot of work on the textures to pretty it up and get it to look more stockalike. And then I've got to teach myself the ins and outs of IVA, but I'm excited how it turned out this morning.

-Josh

It's great! :)
Very cute version of this spacecraft.
It could also be used as a Gemini spacecraft...
Looking great! Two man pods are one of the most requested features in the suggestions forums, so it's a great thing to mod!
